humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that the patient has been diagnosed with a poorly differentiated invasive breast carcinoma with a tumor diameter of 2.2 cm. The tumor has been classified as NOS, G III, pT2N0(sn)LOVORO. According to the rules provided, N0 indicates no positive lymph nodes. Specifically, the notation (sn) in N0(sn) indicates that there are no metastatic carcinomas in the sentinel lymph nodes. Therefore, based on this information, the pathologic N stage of the patient's cancer is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The 'pT2N0(sn)' in the diagnosis indicates that the tumor size is 2.2 cm (pT2) and there is no evidence of lymph node metastasis (N0). The '(sn)' indicates that sentinel lymph node biopsy was performed and no cancer was found in the sentinel node(s). Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N0.
